items.headline: Mysterious UFO at Jeff Bezos’ $165 million Beverly Hills home is probably just a sauna
items.summary_en: Amazon billionaire Jeff Bezos and wife Lauren Sanchez have added an out-of-this-world element to their Beverly Hills mansion: a silver structure that is believed to be a sauna.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I want to gift my grandnieces, ages 5 and 10, stocks. How do I make sure they get an equal amount when they turn 18?
items.summary_en: “One child’s portfolio will have an additional five years of growth.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
items.summary_en: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

items.headline: ‘I’m terrified I’ll be homeless when my husband, 76, stops working’: We only have $100K. What happens to people like us?
items.summary_en: “I’m sick of reading how many millions everyone has.”

items.headline: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
items.summary_en: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

items.headline: ‘You need a third job or a rich husband’: I fell victim to Allen Stanford’s multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme and survived
items.summary_en: “If you have never found yourself in a situation where your life does a complete 180, it’s wrong to talk down to anyone.”

items.headline: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
items.summary_en: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
items.summary_en: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

items.headline: For investors, the real gift from Wall Street comes a day after Christmas
items.summary_en: For the S&P 500, Dec. 26 has historically been the most reliably positive day of the year.
